1.3. Pre-Requisite¶

You must be wondering what is the pre-requisite to start making a website.

I should know how the pages are made. I should know how the server works. I should know how the database is handled. I should know how to format the pages.

Well you are correct, these are the basics that you should know before we can start with our e-commerce website.

Well, here at Webonomics we will be dealing with all this from scratch and build step-by-step our website Myzone.in.
